```{r setup, echo=T, results='hide', message=F, warning=F}
library(tidyverse)

```

## Import the files

```{r}
# set up data import
data_dir <- "../data"
bb200_files <- dir_ls(data_dir, recurse = TRUE, regexp = "billboard-200-201")

# peek at the captured file list
bb200_files
```

```{r}
df <- sapply(
    bb200_files,
    read_csv,
    simplify = FALSE,
    col_types = cols(
      .default = col_character(),
      new = col_skip()
    )
  ) %>% 
  bind_rows()

df %>% head()
```
```{r}
df %>% 
  count(new)
```
